name: Marill
author: sowsow
flavor_text: Even after Marill swims in a cold sea, its water- repellent fur dries almost as soon as Marill leaves the water. That’s why this Pokémon is never cold.

attacks.name: Aqua Liner
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Let’s All Rollout
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage for each of your Benched Pokémon that has the Let’s All Rollout attack.
